THE ORIGINAL HASBRO BOARD GAME - Itâ€™s the classic murder mystery! Who did it? With what weapon? In which room? Thereâ€™s a high-risk party at the mansion and every guest is a suspect. Roll the dice, become a detective and let Cluedo begin! â€¢ A PREMIUM DIGITAL BOARD GAME - There are no ads, no pop-ups and no pay-to-win limits. Once you buy the app, thatâ€™s it: unlimited multiplayer fun for you and your family and nothing to stop you solving the crime! â€¢ A BRAIN TEASER - Test your detective skills. At the start of each game, Cluedo will take one suspect, one weapon, and one room from the deck, and deal the rest to the players. If you ask: â€œwas it Colonel Mustard with the Rope in the Drawing Roomâ€, a player holding the Colonel, the Rope or the Drawing Room must show you their card. Enter every room in search of answers! â€¢ CLUESHEET & HINT SYSTEM - Who committed murder?! Donâ€™t risk letting the criminal escape! Use your virtual cluesheet companion to make a note of the suspects, weapons and rooms you can eliminate. The ideal companion for every detective: cluesheet helps you make your deductions, perfect your strategy and solve the mystery. â€¢ FAMILY FRIENDLY - Itâ€™s the original family board game by Hasbro, suitable for all players 8 years and over. With no adverts or necessary in-app purchases itâ€™s multiplayer fun for kids and adults. With the whole board game on your mobile you can take Cluedo wherever you go! Roll the dice and solve the mystery! â€¢ SINGLE PLAYER - Put your brain to the test against a guest list of AI murder suspects, online or offline! Choose your character, choose your opponents and let no criminal escape the mansion! â€¢ ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Play Cluedo with your friends and find out whoâ€™s guilty on mobile, PC or Nintendo Switch! Donâ€™t let distance stop your board game night. Play on the go, or curl up in an armchair and settle down for a night of crime and detective work, wherever you are! â€¢ 10 ADDITIONAL THEMES - Explore ten different themed boards with Cluedo's Ultimate Detectiveâ€™s Package. Listed under â€œEditorâ€™s Choiceâ€ for the Most Stylish Game, our exclusive original themes are hand crafted by our studio artists. o Tudor Mansion: The guests at this party have turned out to be a lethal combination! o Vampire Castle: In a household where every suspect is a monster, who committed the crime? o Egyptian Adventure: Solve the crime, from the dark tombs of pharaohs to the crumbling pyramids! o Hollywood: In a land where life is an act, can you find the truth in the fairytale? o Murder Express: Challenge your friends to solve a mystery based on a classic Agatha Christie novel! o Sherlock: Become the great detective and solve a crime on the dark streets of London! o Snowy Peaks: Old friends have been reunited. Tensions are running high, but whose grudge ran that deep? o Tropical Mystery: Someone has rocked this boat in a big way! Itâ€™s a luxury race to the answer! o Venetian Masquerade: Historic Venice is beautiful, but crime lurks beneath the surface! o Wild West: From the jailhouse to the saloon, the story of Dr. Blackâ€™s end will spread far and wide. Only you can discover the truth! About Marmalade Game Studio At Marmalade Game Studio we make quality, premium multiplayer board games. entry.content:
ä¼˜æƒ ä¿¡æ¯

App å…§è³¼è²·é …ç›®

  • Lifetime licenseï¼šHK$Â 788.00 â†’ HK$Â 388.00 [HK$Â 388.00 ~ HK$Â 788.00]

åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Experience and control your Apple Home in a whole new way with Controller for HomeKit. Our app combines all the familiar HomeKit features with numerous additional enhancements, offering you a user-friendly interface, unparalleled control, and flexibility. * FLOOR PLAN: Create a detailed floor plan of your home using the LiDAR sensor on your iPhone or iPad and control your HomeKit accessories directly through the floor plan. * COMPLEX AUTOMATIONS: Utilize advanced triggers and conditions for custom automations that are perfectly tailored to your needs. * NOTIFICATIONS: Create custom notifications to stay informed about important events in your home. * BACKUPS: Secure your setup and restore it easily when needed. * SMART FOLDERS: Organize your devices and automations effortlessly with smart folders and custom filters. * WORKFLOWS: Optimize your daily routines with workflows that go beyond the capabilities of Apple Home. * SETUP CODES: Securely store your HomeKit and Matter codes in the app, so they are always at hand and never lost. * MAINTENANCE: Keep track of your setup, quickly identifying which batteries need to be replaced, which devices are unreachable, or which automations are broken. * LOGS: Monitor all activities and changes in your smart home. * WIDGETS: Control your devices faster and easier with convenient widgets or quickly jump into your floor plan. Unlock the full potential of your smart home with Controller for HomeKit. Download the app now and experience how simple and intuitive home automation can be. For more information, visit our website: https://www.controllerforhomekit.com Privacy Policy: https://controllerforhomekit.com/privacy-en/ Terms of Use: https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/
